trans-unit.resname: Scroll two pictures (or more) at once ?
trans-unit.source: Scroll two pictures (or more) at once ?
trans-unit.target: Scroll two pictures (or more) at once ?

trans-unit.resname: Each time the event "on Picture Scroll" is fired, just read the scroll position on picture "1" and apply the same values on picture "2" (and vice-versa ;o) !
trans-unit.source: Each time the event "on Picture Scroll" is fired, just read the scroll position on picture "1" and apply the same values on picture "2" (and vice-versa ;o) !
